verses.t: Bel{H1078} boweth down{H3766}, Nebo{H5015} stoopeth{H7164}, their idols{H6091} were upon the beasts{H2416}, and upon the cattle{H929}: your carriages{H5385} were heavy loaden{H6006}; they are a burden{H4853} to the weary{H5889} beast.

They stoop{H7164}, they bow down{H3766} together{H3162}; they could{H3201} not deliver{H4422} the burden{H4853}, but themselves{H5315} are gone{H1980} into captivity{H7628}.themselves: Heb. their soul

Hearken{H8085} unto me, O house{H1004} of Jacob{H3290}, and all the remnant{H7611} of the house{H1004} of Israel{H3478}, which are borne{H6006} by me from the belly{H990}, which are carried{H5375} from the womb{H7356}:

Remember{H2142} this, and shew yourselves men{H377}: bring it again{H7725} to mind{H3820}, O ye transgressors{H6586}.
Remember{H2142} the former things{H7223} of old{H5769}: for I am God{H410}, and there is none else; I am God{H430}, and there is none{H657} like{H3644} me,

Declaring{H5046} the end{H319} from the beginning{H7225}, and from ancient times{H6924} the things that are not yet done{H6213}, saying{H559}, My counsel{H6098} shall stand{H6965}, and I will do{H6213} all my pleasure{H2656}:
